description:
*This course was last updated in Nov. 2015*

You can easily earn $50,000 or more per year in this industry.

Event Planning is Fun, Fabulous, Fast paced, and Profitable Career.

Some of the many benefits of starting an event planning business is that it can be started inexpensively, from your home office, and if done right it can produce great profits.

This course will prep you for starting your own event planning service or a career in the event planning field.

When you enroll in the course you get lifetime access to all 11 lectures and any additional lessons that are added later. Course material is also included; I've provided sample contacts that can be downloaded and edited for your new business. The course includes about an hour and a half of quality content and several discussions. You will also have the ability to start discussions and ask questions of the instructor and other students at any time.

In this course you'll learn everything from the skills you need to be successful in this industry, all the way to creating contracts, and lots in between.

I will be available on a regular bases to answer course questions from enrolled students.

This course is updated often and once you're enrolled, you'll have access to the course and any added lectures or material forever.

Some additional lectures that will be added are

COMING SOON

  • Planning Social Events VS Corporate Events
  • Planning Self Sponsored Events
  • Event Budgeting

Enroll in this course today and start earning as an Event Planner.
title: Event Planning made simple from Home
